name: Warlock and the Storm
description:
Move: AD or direccional arrows.

Shoot Lighting: Left Mouse Button.

Jump: Right Mouse Button.

Sounds and Music:

https://freesound.org/people/neufv/sounds/54973/

https://freesound.org/people/crispydinner/sounds/276714/

https://freesound.org/people/BloodPixel/sounds/507765/

Graphics (most of them are mine but these are free)

https://edermunizz.itch.io/free-pixel-art-forest

https://jose-moyano.itch.io/blind-warlock-pixel-art

https://jose-moyano.itch.io/evil-tree-pixel-art

The game is based on real events. It happened once I went to the forest.
